You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Kausar! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

desc:

desc:

title: Golden Dragon
desc:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Golden Dragon! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
The hotel Golden Dragon is situated in Bishkek, just about a 10-minute drive from the city centre and the train station. It offers accommodation with free internet access and an outdoor, seasonal swimming pool.
The rooms at Golden Dragon are spacious and individually decorated in lively colours. They are air-conditioned and there is a minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries in each.
The on-site Gang Nam restaurant serves Korean cuisine, offering original serving. It also offers buffet breakfast. Room service is available 24 hours a day.
The hotel has great conference and business facilities. For guests to relax in, there is a spa zone with saunas and a hot tub, as well as a gym. There is an on-site gift shop.
Laundry and dry cleaning services are provided and the hotel’s staff can organize sightseeing tours.
The airport is a 40-minute drive away and shuttle can be arranged for the hotel’s guests.
